name: Pokimane
description: Pokimane (Imane Anys) is one of the largest livestreamers on Twitch, with a follower count of 8.9 on the platform. Outside of her gaming content and OfflineTV projects, she's contributed to a $100K scholarship fund for college students, and serves as co-founder and Chief Creative Officer for RTS, a talent management and brand consulting firm directed towards supporting gaming and esports personalities in their careers.
